Verses: 1 marupadiyum Avar Jebaaalayaththil Piravesiththaar. Ange Soombina Kaiyudaiya Oru Manushan Irundhaan.
2 avar Oivunaalil Avanai Sosthamaakkinaal Avarperil Kutranjaattalaamendru Avarmel Nokkamaayirundhaargal.
3 appozhudhu Avar Soombinakaiyaiyudaiya Manushanai Nokki: Ezhundhu Naduve Nil Endru Solli;
4 avargalaip Paarththu: Oivunaatkalil Nanmaiseyvadho, Theemaiseyvadho, Jeevanaikkaappadho Azhippadho, Edhu Niyaayam Endraar. Adharku Avargal Pesaamalirundhaargal.

5 avargaludaiya Irudhayakadinaththinimiththam Avar Visanappattu, Kobaththudane Sutrilum Irundhavargalaip Paarththu, Andha Manushanai Nokki: Un Kaiyai Neettu Endraar; Avan Neettinaan; Avan Kai Marukaiyaippola Sosthamaayitru.
6 udane Pariseyar Purappattuppoi, Avaraik Kolaiseyyumpadi, Avarukku Virodhamaai Erodhiyarodekooda Aalosanaipanninaargal.
7 yesu Thammudaiya Seeshargalode Avvidam Vittu, Kadaloraththukkup Ponaar.

8 galileyaavilum, Yoodheyaavilum, Erusalemilum, Idhumeyaavilum, Yordhaanukku Akkaraiyilumirundhu Thiralaana Janangal Vandhu, Avarukkup Pinsendraargal. Allaamalum Theeru Seedhon Pattanangalin Thisaigalilumirundhu Thiralaana Janangal Avar Seydha Arpudhangalaikkuriththuk Kelvippattu, Avaridaththil Vandhaargal.
9 avar Anekarai Sosthamaakkinaar. Noyaaligalellaarum Adhai Arindhu Avaraith Thodavendumendru Avaridaththil Nerungivandhaargal.
10  Janangal Thiralaayirundhapadiyaal Avargal Thammai Nerukkaadhapadikku, Thamakkaaga Oru Padavai Aayaththampanna Vendumendru, Thammudaiya Seeshargalukku Sonnaar.
11 asuththa Aavigalum Avaraik Kandapodhu, Avar Munbaaga Vizhundhu: Neer Dhevanudaiya Kumaaran Endru Saththamittana.
12 thammaip Pirasiththampannaadhapadi Avaigalukkuk Kandippaaik Kattalaiyittaar.
13 pinbu Avar Oru Malaiyinmel Eri, Thamakkuch Siththamaanavargalaith Thammidaththil Varavazhaiththaar; Avargal Avaridaththirku Vandhaargal.
14 appozhudhu Avar Pannirandu Peraith Therindhukondu, Avargal Thammodukooda Irukkavum, Pirasangampannumpadiyaagath Thaam Avargalai Anuppavum,
15 viyaadhigalaik Gunamaakkip Pisaasugalaith Thuraththumpadi Avargal Adhigaaramudaiyavargalaayirukkavum, Avargalai Erpaduththinaar.
16 avargal Yaarenil, Seemon, Ivanukkup Pedhuru Engira Peyarittaar.
17 sebadheyuvin Kumaaranaagiya Yaakkobu, Yaakkobin Sagodharanaagiya Yovaan, Ivviruvarukkum Idimuzhakka Makkalendru Arththankollum Povanerkes Engira Peyarittaar.
18 andhireyaa, Pilippu, Parththolomeyu, Maththeyu, Thomaa, Albeyuvin Kumaaran Yaakkobu, Thadheyu, Kaanaaniyanaagiya Seemon,
19 avaraik Kaattikkoduththa Yoodhaaskaariyoththu Enbavargale.
20 pinbu Veettukkup Ponaargal; Ange Avargal Saappiduvadharkum Samayamillaadhapadikku Anega Janangal Marupadiyum Koodivandhaargal.
21 avarudaiya Inaththaar Idhaikkettapodhu, Avar Madhimayangiyirukkiraar Endru Solli Avaraip Pidiththukkollumpadi Vandhaargal.
22 erusalemilirundhu Vandha Vedhapaaragar: Ivan Peyelsepoolaikkontirukkiraan. Pisaasugalin Thalaivanaale Pisaasugalaith Thuraththugiraan Endraargal.
23 avargalai Avar Azhaiththu, Uvamaigalaai Avargalukku Sonnadhaavadhu: Saaththaanai Saaththaan Thuraththuvadhu Eppadi?
24 oru Raajyam Thanakkuthaane Virodhamaagap Pirindhirundhaal, Andha Raajyam Nilainirkamaattaadhe.
25 oru Veedu Thanakkuththaane Virodhamaagap Pirindhirundhaal, Andha Veedu Nilainirkamaattaadhe.
26 saaththaan Thanakkuththaane Virodhamaaga Ezhumbip Pirindhirundhaal, Avan Nilainirkamaattaamal, Azhindhupovaane.
27 balavaanai Mundhik Kattinaalozhiya, Oruvanum Balavaanudaiya Veettukkul Pugundhu, Avan Udamaigalaik Kollaiyidakkoodaadhu; Kattinaaneyaagil, Avan Veettaik Kollaiyiduvaan.
28 meyyaagave Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren: Manushargal Seyyum Ellaap Paavangalum, Avargal Dhooshikkum Endhath Thooshanangalum, Avargalukku Mannikkappadum;
29 oruvan Parisuththa Aavikku Virodhamaagath Dhooshanansolvaanaagil, Avan Endrendraikkum Mannippadaiyaamal Niththiya Aakkinaikkullaayiruppaan Endraar.
30 asuththa Aaviyaikkondirukkiraanendru Avargal Sonnapadiyinaale Avar Ippadi Sonnaar.
31 appozhudhu Avarudaiya Sagodhararum, Thaayaarum Vandhu, Veliye Nindru, Avarai Azhaikkumpadi Avaridaththil Aal Anuppinaargal.
32 avarai Sutrilum Utkaarndhirundha Janangal Avarai Nokki: Idho, Ummudaiya Thaayaarum Ummudaiya Sagodhararum Veliye Nindru Ummaith Thedugiraargal Endraargal.
33 avargalukku Avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: En Thaayaar Yaar? En Sagodharar Yaar? Endru Solli,
34 thammaichsoozha Utkaarndhirundhavargalai Sutrip Paarththu: Idho, En Thaayum En Sagodhararum Ivargale!
35 dhevanudaiya Siththaththinpadi Seygiravan Evano Avane Enakku Sagodharanum, Enakku Sagodhariyum, Enakkuth Thaayumaai Irukkiraan Endraar.
